original_title: Bank of Ceylon hosts Bakthi Gee in celebration of Vesak
original_body_lines: The Bank of Ceylon’s Buddhist Association organised its annual Vesak Bakthi Gee in line with the bank’s Vesak celebrations recently at the head office premise. The event was held with the patronage of the bank’s General Manager Russel Fonseka with the participation of the staff members including members of the corporate and executive management. This event is a much awaited event for all staff members including past-staff of the bank, some of whom participated for the Bakthi Gee performance as well
